name: On The Path Remastered
description: On The Path - is a game based on ancient russian fairy tales and taoism of Lao Tzu , it takes place in a world where women and men with magic talents, which represent Yin and Yang, fight against each other. Some madness mix. And, yes, you play as ...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 2.16 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 900 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
